name: Awesim Physics
short_description: This is a command line based Physics Simulator that can export data to a spreadsheet program. Awesim Physics can be used to simulate everything from a ball being thrown upwards to the obits of planets in a solar system.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: GNU General Public License version 2.0 (GPLv2)
